typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		State as string,
		City as string,
		Month as integer '000',
		Day as integer '000',
		Year as integer '000',
		AvgTemperature as float '000.##'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 0,
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['city_temperature*']) ~> source1
source1 split(Country=="Algeria",
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Algeria, Other)
ConditionalSplit1@Algeria select(mapColumn(
		Region,
		Country,
		State,
		City,
		Month,
		Day,
		Year,
		AvgTemperature
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRegionCountryStateCity
SelectRegionCountryStateCity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: '',
	format: 'cdm',
	corpusPath: '',
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: '',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
